title: Sea bass with lemon mash and a saffron mussel sauce
description: Try this simple fish dish with a posh shellfish sauce for a special meal for two.
ingredients: 4 medium floury potatoes, such as King Edward, peeled and cut into even-sized chunks
1 lemon, grated zest and juice only, to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 mussels, cleaned, beards removed (discard any mussels that do not close tightly when tapped)
2 fillets sea bass, each weighing about 150g/5oz, skin diagonally scored in three places with a sharp knife
